FakesomeFest Setup Guide ​

For real Wii U's only. ​

Hi! If you're here, that means you have a real Wii U and want to install FakesomeFest.

Requirements:

  1. A copy of Splatoon.
  2. A modded Wii U with Aroma. Follow a guide if you haven't hacked yours yet.
  3. The custom version of Pretendo's Inkay plugin.

If you have all of those, you're ready to go!

Continue to Installing.
